snippet: The annual Oscar nominees’ luncheon, where everyone roots for one another, was attended by 150 of the 188 in the running for awards, including 20 in the acting category.
abstract: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences annual Oscar nominee luncheon is an opportunity for celebrities to rub shoulders and root for each other before the awards ceremony.
lead_paragraph: The annual Oscar nominees’ luncheon, where everyone roots for one another, was attended by 150 of the 188 in the running for awards, including 20 in the acting category.

headline.seo: Oscar Nominee Luncheon Attracts Big Names
headline.main: Year’s Best Acting? Perhaps It Was Here
headline.print_headline: Year’s Best Acting? Perhaps It Was Here

keywords.value: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
keywords.name: organizations
